announcements.title: 🛠 Server Maintenance
announcements.message: The server is currently all good so play with your friends. Thank you.

announcements.title: 🏰 Castle Building Event
announcements.message: Join our special Castle Building Event! Build the best castle and win 2 magic spells and a set of enchanted armor. Show your creativity and compete with other players!And we provide event date fast.

announcements.title: ✨ Magical Server
announcements.message: This is a magical server — discover rare spells, and team up with friends to unlock hidden quests and surprises.

announcements.title: 🛡 Custom Armour Release
announcements.message: New custom armour is available! Equip exclusive sets with special properties. Visit the armory in-game to craft or obtain these unique armours.
